attributes.action: assign 50% of MP's expenses budget towards funding projects in their constituencies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in recent news it has come to light about MP's expenses being used in an inordinate way, therefore i propose utilising 50% of a proposed budget to funding projects in their constituencies

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
